text: 4-5 years of experience as system support engineer. - BS/BE/BCS/BIT in Computer Science. Experience in Dell Vxrail installation and configuration with primary to secondary site stretch clustering knowledge. Experience on Veeam installation and configuration on CDP or failover and failback solutions. Knowledge on VDI solutions on different scenarios on (Microsoft/Citrix/Horizon) etc. Experience in VMware 7.0 installation and configuration on different scenarios on (FT/HA/Replication) etc. Strong understanding and implementation skill of virtualization and backup replication software solutions. Veeam and VMware certification is a must. Job Location : Karachi. Gender: Male.
